Set Background Knowledge to Disco Method

Source: R/disco-method.R
set_knowledge.Rd

Set Background Knowledge to Disco Method

Usage

set_knowledge(method, knowledge)

# S3 method for class 'disco_method'
set_knowledge(method, knowledge)

Arguments

method

A "disco_method" function.

knowledge

A knowledge object appropriate for the engine.
